alert.note: Alert for Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 12:51PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Onondaga County through 130 PM EDT... At 1251 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Skaneateles, or 9 miles east of Auburn, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Van Buren, Skaneateles, Marcellus, Amboy, Camillus, Marysville, Bennetts Corners, Cedarvale, Fairmount and Warners. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
